snippet: An official report shows that by some measures, tensions at the end of last year were at their highest levels since the collapse of the investment bank Lehman Brothers in 2008.
abstract: Report by the Bank for International Settlements shows that by some measures, doubt persists over whether the actions taken by the European Central Bank and its emergency loan program will promote economic growth.
lead_paragraph: An official report shows that by some measures, tensions at the end of last year were at their highest levels since the collapse of the investment bank Lehman Brothers in 2008.

headline.seo: Report Shows Depth of the Distress in Europe
headline.main: Report Shows Depth of the Distress in Europe
headline.print_headline: Report Shows Depth of the Distress in Europe
